title: Light of a River in Darkness
description: Tadamori came to Tokyo to seek revenge. Joining the Yakuza was his way in. He was focused, determined, and his mind set on what he had to do.Then, one raining night everything changed.He didn't expect breaking up a fight to change his course. Didn't expect her, Kikuko. Or that one incident would put him right in the middle of a Yakuza war.Tadamori had no control over the destiny that put Kikuko in his path. But in order to be with her, he needs to turn his back on his Yakuza for their rivals.Can Tadamori manage to find his vengence that brought him to the city, while also protecting his inescapable love?Nothing is fair in the life of the Yakuza, especially love.
author: Amelia    Oliver
